original_text: Other Levites who belonged to Kohath's clan prepared the bread for the special table. The priests put this bread on the special table in the Holy Place each Sabbath day.
korean_text: 또 그의 형제 그핫 자손 중에 어떤 자는 진설하는 떡을 맡아 안식일마다 준비하였더라

sentences.original_text: Other Levites who belonged to Kohath's clan
sentences.korean_translation: 고핫 족속에 속한 다른 레위 사람들은

sentences.original_text: prepared the bread for the special table
on the special table in the Holy Place
